mapper.select: SELECT id, opr_id, opr_name, STATUS, cash_total, cash_gaven, cash_not_give, wx_total, union_total, alipay_total, bank_receipts_total, receive_id, create_time, total_num, total_id, end_time FROM t_jg_total_calculation WHERE opr_id=#{oprId} AND project_id=#{projectId} AND opr_id != receive_id ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT ( CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(cash_total,0.0)) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(IFNULL(cash_total,0.0)) END ) cashTotal, ( CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(wx_total,0.0)) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(wx_total) END ) wxTotal, ( CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(alipay_total,0.0) ) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(IFNULL(alipay_total,0.0)) END ) alipayTotal, ( CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(bank_receipts_total,0.0) ) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(IFNULL(bank_receipts_total,0.0)) END ) bankReceiptsTotal, ( CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(union_total,0.0)) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(IFNULL(union_total,0.0)) END ) unionTotal, ( CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(cash_gaven,0.0)) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(IFNULL(cash_gaven,0.0)) END ) cashGaven, ( CASE WHEN ( SUM(IFNULL(cash_not_give,0.0)) + SUM(IFNULL(wx_not_give,0.0)) + SUM(IFNULL(union_not_give,0.0)) +SUM(IFNULL(bank_receipts_not_give,0.0)) + SUM(IFNULL(alipay_total,0.0)) ) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ( SUM(IFNULL(cash_not_give,0.0)) + SUM(IFNULL(wx_not_give,0.0)) + SUM(IFNULL(union_not_give,0.0)) + SUM(IFNULL(bank_receipts_not_give,0.0)) + SUM(IFNULL(alipay_total,0.0)) ) END ) notGive
FROM t_jg_total_calculation WHERE receive_id = #{oprId} AND project_id = #{projectId} AND STATUS = '3' AND total_id IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE t_jg_total_calculation SET total_id=#{0},end_time=NOW() WHERE total_id IS NULL AND STATUS=3 AND receive_id=#{1} AND project_id = #{2}
mapper.select: SELECT id, opr_id, opr_name, STATUS, cash_total, cash_gaven, cash_not_give, wx_total, union_total, alipay_total, bank_receipts_total, receive_id, create_time, total_id, total_num, end_time FROM t_jg_total_calculation WHERE total_id=#{totalId} AND STATUS != 2

SELECT id, opr_id, opr_name, STATUS, cash_total, cash_gaven, cash_not_give, wx_total, union_total, alipay_total, bank_receipts_total, receive_id, create_time, total_id, total_num, end_time FROM t_jg_total_calculation WHERE total_id IS NULL AND receive_id =#{oprId} AND STATUS =3 AND project_id=#{projectId}

SELECT ( CASE WHEN SUM(opr_amount) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(opr_amount) END ) oprAmount FROM t_jg_give_account_detail t1, t_jg_total_calculation t2 WHERE t2.id = t1.total_id AND t1. STATUS = 3 AND t1.receive_id = #{oprId} AND t2.total_id IS NULL AND t1.type = 2
